Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a game session of CodexNaturalis, collecting and managing all the components and all the necessaries pieces of information related to the current state of the game
See Also:
